page.title: 20Glympton Post Office
page.content: Mrs.Pitts is the postmistress and shop keeper of Glympton stores.She is a new-comer to the village,she has only been there a year.The shop sells general groceries,wines and spirits. There are about 100 people in the village,14 elderly people,20 children and 66 adults,most of whom work for the Towler estate. The shop is open most of the week,but they have half day closing on Wednesdays,and Saturdays.Their busiest days are Fridays and Saturdays.Mrs.Pitts said that about 350 pounds was spent each week on groceries.Most people use the post office for postage stamps and to collect their pensions.
